Post.title: HexoÂÆâË£Ö‰ΩøÁî®
Post._content:
## ‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØhexo?
Hexo ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âø´ÈÄü„ÄÅÁÆÄÊ¥Å‰∏îÈ´òÊïàÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢Ê°ÜÊû∂„ÄÇHexo ‰ΩøÁî® MarkdownÔºàÊàñÂÖ∂‰ªñÊ∏≤ÊüìÂºïÊìéÔºâËß£ÊûêÊñáÁ´†ÔºåÂú®Âá†ÁßíÂÜÖÔºåÂç≥ÂèØÂà©Áî®Èùì‰∏ΩÁöÑ‰∏ªÈ¢òÁîüÊàêÈùôÊÄÅÁΩëÈ°µ„ÄÇÊó¢ÁÑ∂Â¶ÇÊ≠§‰æøÊç∑ÔºåÈÇ£‰∏ãÈù¢Êàë‰ª¨ÂºÄÂßãÂÆâË£Ö‰ΩøÁî®ÂêßÔºÅ

### ÂáÜÂ§áÁéØÂ¢É
ËØ¥ÊòéÔºöÊú¨‰∫∫‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑ‰∏ªÊú∫ÊòØcentos7.3
1. ÂÆâË£Ö[node.js](http://www.runoob.com/nodejs/nodejs-install-setup.html) ÔºåËæìÂÖ•node -v Âíå npm -v‰ºöÊ≠£Á°ÆÊòæÁ§∫Âá∫ÁâàÊú¨Âè∑
![upload successful](/images/image.png)
2. ÂÆâË£Ö[git](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v1/%E8%B5%B7%E6%AD%A5-%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85-Git)ÔºåÂÆâË£ÖÂÆåÊàêÂêéÂú®ÂëΩ‰ª§ÊèêÁ§∫Á¨¶‰∏≠ËæìÂÖ•git --versionÈ™åËØÅÊòØÂê¶ÂÆâË£ÖÊàêÂäü„ÄÇ
3. Ê≥®ÂÜå[GithubË¥¶Âè∑](https://github.com/)ÔºåÂπ∂ÂàõÂª∫È°πÁõÆÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊ≠•È™§Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö
>ÊâìÂºÄhttps://github.com/Âπ∂ÁôªÈôÜÔºåÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™È°πÁõÆÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö

>![upload successful](/images/image1.png)

>ËæìÂÖ•È°πÁõÆÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÂêéÈù¢‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÂä†.github.ioÂêéÁºÄÔºåÊ≥®ÊÑèÈ°πÁõÆÂêçÁß∞Ë¶ÅÂíåËá™Â∑±ÁöÑgithubÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÁõ∏Âêå
>![upload successful](/images/image2.png)
> ÁÇπÂáªcreate repositoryÁÑ∂ÂêéÈ°πÁõÆÂ∞±Âª∫Êàê‰∫ÜÔºåÁÇπÂáªSettingsÔºåÂêë‰∏ãÊãâÂà∞ÊúÄÂêéÁöÑGitHub PagesÔºåÁÇπÂáªChoose a themeÈÄâÊã©‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏ªÈ¢òÂêéÔºåÂÜçÂõûÂà∞ GitHub PagesÔºåÁÇπÂáªÁîüÊàêÁöÑÈìæÊé•*https://chenhexiang2017.github.io/*ÔºåÂ∞±‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁΩëÈ°µÂï¶ÔºåÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

![upload successful](/images/image3.png)

>Âà∞Ê≠§ÂâçÈù¢ÁöÑÂáÜÂ§áÂ∑•‰ΩúÂ∞±ÁÆóÁªìÊùü‰∫ÜÔºå‰∏ãÈù¢ÂºÄÂßãÂÆâË£Öhexo.




### ÂÆâË£ÖHexo
‰ΩøÁî®xshellËøûÊé•‰∏ªÊú∫ÔºåÂú®/homeÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏ãÂàõÂª∫Êñá‰ª∂Â§πblog(Êñá‰ª∂Â§πË∑ØÂæÑÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ)
``` bash
$ cd /home/blog
$ npm install hexo-cli -g
$ npm install hexo --save
$ hexo -v   #È™åËØÅÊòØÂê¶ÂÆâË£ÖÊàêÂäü
```
ËæìÂÖ•hexo initÂàùÂßãÂåñÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÔºåÊé•ÁùÄËæìÂÖ•npm installÂÆâË£ÖÂøÖÂ§áÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂„ÄÇ

ËøôÊ†∑Êú¨Âú∞ÁöÑÁΩëÁ´ôÈÖçÁΩÆÊêûÂÆöÂêéÔºåËæìÂÖ•hexo gÁîüÊàêÈùôÊÄÅÁΩëÈ°µÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéËæìÂÖ•hexo sÊâìÂºÄÊú¨Âú∞ÊúçÂä°Âô®ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊµèËßàÂô®ÊâìÂºÄ[http://ip:4000/](javascript:;)ÔºåÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞ÂçöÂÆ¢È°µÈù¢Âï¶„ÄÇ


### ËøûÊé•Github‰∏éÊú¨Âú∞
```bash
$ git config --global user.name "chenhexiang2017"
$ git config --global user.email "1305673350@qq.com"
```
Áî®Êà∑ÂêçÂíåÈÇÆÁÆ±Ê†πÊçÆ‰Ω†Ê≥®ÂÜågithubÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØËá™Ë°å‰øÆÊîπ„ÄÇ

ÁÑ∂ÂêéÁîüÊàêÂØÜÈí•SSH keyÔºö
```bash
$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "1305673350@qq.com"
```
ËæìÂÖ•eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"ÔºåÊ∑ªÂä†ÂØÜÈí•Âà∞ssh-agent„ÄÇ

ÂÜçËæìÂÖ•ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsaÔºåÊ∑ªÂä†ÁîüÊàêÁöÑSSH keyÂà∞ssh-agent„ÄÇ

ÊâìÂºÄgithubÔºåÂú®Â§¥ÂÉè‰∏ãÈù¢ÁÇπÂáªsettingsÔºåÂÜçÁÇπÂáªSSH and GPG keysÔºåÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™SSHÔºåÂêçÂ≠óÈöè‰æø„ÄÇ

ÊâìÂºÄview /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pubÔºåÔºåÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÂ§çÂà∂Âà∞Êñ∞Âª∫ÁöÑSSH‰∏≠„ÄÇ

ËæìÂÖ•ssh -T git@github.comÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂêçËØ¥ÊòéÊàêÂäü‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

![upload successful](/images/image4.png)

‰øÆÊîπÂçöÂÆ¢ÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆ_config.ymlÊñá‰ª∂Ôºàvi /home/blog/_config.ymlÔºâ
```
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/chenhexiang2017/chenhexiang2017.github.io.git
  branch: master

```
repository‰øÆÊîπ‰∏∫Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑgithubÈ°πÁõÆÂú∞ÂùÄ„ÄÇ

ÈÉ®ÁΩ≤Âà∞github:
```
hexo clean && hexo g && hexo d
```
ËÆøÈóÆ‰∏äÈù¢GitHub PagesÁîüÊàêÁöÑÈìæÊé•*https://chenhexiang2017.github.io/*Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•‰∫Ü„ÄÇ


### HexoÂÆâË£Önext Gemini‰∏ªÈ¢òÂèäÁõ∏ÂÖ≥‰ºòÂåñ
Âú®ÂçöÂÆ¢Êõ¥ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÂÆâË£Ö‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºö`git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next`

Âú®Ê†πÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂_config.ymlÈáåËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºö`theme: next`

**Êé•‰∏ãÊù•Êàë‰ª¨Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•Êù•ÊåâÈúÄÈÖçÁΩÆ‰∏ªÈ¢òÂÜÖÂÆπ‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄÊúâÂÜÖÂÆπÈÉΩÂú®themes/nextÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏ãÁöÑ_config.ymlÊñá‰ª∂Èáå‰øÆÊîπ**„ÄÇ

1. ËèúÂçïÊ†è menu `||ÂêéÈù¢ÊòØfontAwesomeÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂêçÁß∞`

```
menu:
  È¶ñÈ°µ: / || home
  Ê†áÁ≠æ: /tags/ || tags
  #categories: /categories/ || th
  ÂΩíÊ°£: /archives/ || archive
  ÂÖ≥‰∫é: /about/ || user
  #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap
  #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat

```
2.‰∏ªÈ¢òÈ£éÊ†º schemes

Ê†πÊçÆËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂñúÂ•ΩËøõË°åËÆæÁΩÆ

```
# Schemes
#scheme: Muse
#scheme: Mist
#scheme: Pisces
scheme: Gemini

```

Âú®Ê†πÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂_config.ymlÈáåËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºö`theme: next`

**Êé•‰∏ãÊù•Êàë‰ª¨Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•Êù•ÊåâÈúÄÈÖçÁΩÆ‰∏ªÈ¢òÂÜÖÂÆπ‰∫ÜÔºåÊâÄÊúâÂÜÖÂÆπÈÉΩÂú®themes/nextÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏ãÁöÑ_config.ymlÊñá‰ª∂Èáå‰øÆÊîπ**„ÄÇ

1. ËèúÂçïÊ†è menu `||ÂêéÈù¢ÊòØfontAwesomeÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂêçÁß∞`

```
menu:
  È¶ñÈ°µ: / || home
  Ê†áÁ≠æ: /tags/ || tags
  #categories: /categories/ || th
  ÂΩíÊ°£: /archives/ || archive
  ÂÖ≥‰∫é: /about/ || user
  #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar
  #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap
  #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat

```
2.‰∏ªÈ¢òÈ£éÊ†º schemes

Ê†πÊçÆËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂñúÂ•ΩËøõË°åËÆæÁΩÆ

```
# Schemes
#scheme: Muse
#scheme: Mist
#scheme: Pisces
scheme: Gemini

```
Post.content:
‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØhexo?

Hexo ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Âø´ÈÄü„ÄÅÁÆÄÊ¥Å‰∏îÈ´òÊïàÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢Ê°ÜÊû∂„ÄÇHexo ‰ΩøÁî® MarkdownÔºàÊàñÂÖ∂‰ªñÊ∏≤ÊüìÂºïÊìéÔºâËß£ÊûêÊñáÁ´†ÔºåÂú®Âá†ÁßíÂÜÖÔºåÂç≥ÂèØÂà©Áî®Èùì‰∏ΩÁöÑ‰∏ªÈ¢òÁîüÊàêÈùôÊÄÅÁΩëÈ°µ„ÄÇÊó¢ÁÑ∂Â¶ÇÊ≠§‰æøÊç∑ÔºåÈÇ£‰∏ãÈù¢Êàë‰ª¨ÂºÄÂßãÂÆâË£Ö‰ΩøÁî®ÂêßÔºÅ

ÂáÜÂ§áÁéØÂ¢É

ËØ¥ÊòéÔºöÊú¨‰∫∫‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑ‰∏ªÊú∫ÊòØcentos7.3

  1. ÂÆâË£Önode.js ÔºåËæìÂÖ•node -v Âíå npm -v‰ºöÊ≠£Á°ÆÊòæÁ§∫Âá∫ÁâàÊú¨Âè∑
  2. ÂÆâË£ÖgitÔºåÂÆâË£ÖÂÆåÊàêÂêéÂú®ÂëΩ‰ª§ÊèêÁ§∫Á¨¶‰∏≠ËæìÂÖ•git --versionÈ™åËØÅÊòØÂê¶ÂÆâË£ÖÊàêÂäü„ÄÇ
  3. Ê≥®ÂÜåGithubË¥¶Âè∑ÔºåÂπ∂ÂàõÂª∫È°πÁõÆÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊ≠•È™§Â¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

ÊâìÂºÄhttps://github.com/Âπ∂ÁôªÈôÜÔºåÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™È°πÁõÆÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÊâÄÁ§∫Ôºö

ËæìÂÖ•È°πÁõÆÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÂêéÈù¢‰∏ÄÂÆöË¶ÅÂä†.github.ioÂêéÁºÄÔºåÊ≥®ÊÑèÈ°πÁõÆÂêçÁß∞Ë¶ÅÂíåËá™Â∑±ÁöÑgithubÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÁõ∏Âêå

ÁÇπÂáªcreate repositoryÁÑ∂ÂêéÈ°πÁõÆÂ∞±Âª∫Êàê‰∫ÜÔºåÁÇπÂáªSettingsÔºåÂêë‰∏ãÊãâÂà∞ÊúÄÂêéÁöÑGitHub PagesÔºåÁÇπÂáªChoose a themeÈÄâÊã©‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏ªÈ¢òÂêéÔºåÂÜçÂõûÂà∞ GitHub PagesÔºåÁÇπÂáªÁîüÊàêÁöÑÈìæÊé•https://chenhexiang2017.github.io/ÔºåÂ∞±‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁΩëÈ°µÂï¶ÔºåÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö

Âà∞Ê≠§ÂâçÈù¢ÁöÑÂáÜÂ§áÂ∑•‰ΩúÂ∞±ÁÆóÁªìÊùü‰∫ÜÔºå‰∏ãÈù¢ÂºÄÂßãÂÆâË£Öhexo.

ÂÆâË£ÖHexo

‰ΩøÁî®xshellËøûÊé•‰∏ªÊú∫ÔºåÂú®/homeÊñá‰ª∂Â§π‰∏ãÂàõÂª∫Êñá‰ª∂Â§πblog(Êñá‰ª∂Â§πË∑ØÂæÑÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ)

ËæìÂÖ•hexo initÂàùÂßãÂåñÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÔºåÊé•ÁùÄËæìÂÖ•npm installÂÆâË£ÖÂøÖÂ§áÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂„ÄÇ

ËøôÊ†∑Êú¨Âú∞ÁöÑÁΩëÁ´ôÈÖçÁΩÆÊêûÂÆöÂêéÔºåËæìÂÖ•hexo gÁîüÊàêÈùôÊÄÅÁΩëÈ°µÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéËæìÂÖ•hexo sÊâìÂºÄÊú¨Âú∞ÊúçÂä°Âô®ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊµèËßàÂô®ÊâìÂºÄ[http://ip:4000/](javascript:;)ÔºåÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂà∞ÂçöÂÆ¢È°µÈù¢Âï¶„ÄÇ

ËøûÊé•Github‰∏éÊú¨Âú∞

Áî®Êà∑ÂêçÂíåÈÇÆÁÆ±Ê†πÊçÆ‰Ω†Ê≥®ÂÜågithubÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØËá™Ë°å‰øÆÊîπ„ÄÇ

ÁÑ∂ÂêéÁîüÊàêÂØÜÈí•SSH keyÔºö

ËæìÂÖ•eval ‚Äú$(ssh-agent -s)‚ÄùÔºåÊ∑ªÂä†ÂØÜÈí•Âà∞ssh-agent„ÄÇ

ÂÜçËæìÂÖ•ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsaÔºåÊ∑ªÂä†ÁîüÊàêÁöÑSSH keyÂà∞ssh-agent„ÄÇ

ÊâìÂºÄgithubÔºåÂú®Â§¥ÂÉè‰∏ãÈù¢ÁÇπÂáªsettingsÔºåÂÜçÁÇπÂáªSSH and GPG keysÔºåÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™SSHÔºåÂêçÂ≠óÈöè‰æø„ÄÇ

ÊâìÂºÄview /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pubÔºåÔºåÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂‰∏≠ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÂ§çÂà∂Âà∞Êñ∞Âª∫ÁöÑSSH‰∏≠„ÄÇ

ËæìÂÖ•ssh -T git@github.comÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÁî®Êà∑ÂêçËØ¥ÊòéÊàêÂäü‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

‰øÆÊîπÂçöÂÆ¢ÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆ_config.ymlÊñá‰ª∂Ôºàvi /home/blog/_config.ymlÔºâ

repository‰øÆÊîπ‰∏∫Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑgithubÈ°πÁõÆÂú∞ÂùÄ„ÄÇ

ÈÉ®ÁΩ≤Âà∞github:

ËÆøÈóÆ‰∏äÈù¢GitHub PagesÁîüÊàêÁöÑÈìæÊé•*https://chenhexiang2017.github.io/*Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•‰∫Ü„ÄÇ

HexoÂÆâË£Önext Gemini‰∏ªÈ¢òÂèäÁõ∏ÂÖ≥‰ºòÂåñ

Âú®ÂçöÂÆ¢Êõ¥ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÂÆâË£Ö‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºögit clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next

  1. ËèúÂçïÊ†è menu ||ÂêéÈù¢ÊòØfontAwesomeÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂêçÁß∞

Post.title: [Hexo] Theme BeanTech
Post.subtitle: This is hexo theme Demo.
Post._content: > Ported Theme of [Hux Blog](https://github.com/Huxpro/huxpro.github.io), Thank [Huxpro](https://github.com/Huxpro) for designing such a flawless theme. > > This BeanTech theme created by [YuHsuan](http://beantech.org) modified from the original Porter [Kaijun](http://kaijun.rocks/hexo-theme-huxblog/) # [Live Demo](http://beantech.org) --- ![BeanTech Desktop](http://beantech.org/img/beantech-desktop.png) # Usage --- I publish the whole project for your convenience, so you can just follow the instruction down below, then you can easily customiz your own blog! Let's begin!!! ## Init --- ```bash git clone https://github.com/YenYuHsuan/hexo-theme-beantech.git ./hexo-beantech cd hexo-beantech npm install ``` ## Modify --- Modify `_config.yml` file with your own info. Especially the section: ### Deployment Replace to your own repo! ```yml deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com// branch: ``` ### Sidebar settings Copy your avatar image to `/img/` and modify the `_config.yml`: ```yml sidebar: true # whether or not using Sidebar. sidebar-about-description: "" sidebar-avatar: img/ ``` and activate your personal widget you like ```yml widgets: # here are widget you can use, you can comment out - featured-tags - short-about - recent-posts - friends-blog - archive - category ``` if you want to add sidebar widget, please add at `layout/_widget`. ### Signature Setup Copy your signature image to `/img/signature` and modify the `_config.yml`: ```yml signature: true # show signature signature-img: img/signature/ ``` ### Go to top icon Setup My icon is using iron man, you can change to your own icon at `css/image`. ### Post tag You can decide to show post tags or not. ```yml home_posts_tag: true ``` ![home_posts_tag-true](home_posts_tag-true.png) ```yml home_posts_tag: false ``` ![home_posts_tag-false](home_posts_tag-false.png) ### Markdown render My markdown render engine plugin is [hexo-renderer-markdown-it](https://github.com/celsomiranda/hexo-renderer-markdown-it). ```yml # Markdown-it config ## Docs: https://github.com/celsomiranda/hexo-renderer-markdown-it/wiki markdown: render: html: true xhtmlOut: false breaks: true linkify: true typographer: true quotes: '‚Äú‚Äù‚Äò‚Äô' ``` and if you want to change the header anchor '‚Ñ¨', you can go to `layout/post.ejs` to change it. ```javascript async("https://cdn.bootcss.com/anchor-js/1.1.1/anchor.min.js",function(){ anchors.options = { visible: 'hover', placement: 'left', icon: ‚Ñ¨ // this is the header anchor "unicode" icon }; ``` ## Hexo Basics --- Some hexo command: ```bash hexo new post "" # you can change post to another layout if you want hexo clean && hexo generate # generate the static file hexo server # run hexo in local environment hexo deploy # hexo will push the static files automatically into the specific branch(gh-pages) of your repo! ``` # Have fun ^_^ --- Please Star this Project if you like it! Follow would also be appreciated! Peace!
Post.raw: title: '[Hexo] Theme BeanTech' catalog: true subtitle: This is hexo theme Demo. header-img: Demo.png tags: [] catagories: - Hexo categories: [] date: 2019-01-15 08:05:00 --- > Ported Theme of [Hux Blog](https://github.com/Huxpro/huxpro.github.io), Thank [Huxpro](https://github.com/Huxpro) for designing such a flawless theme. > > This BeanTech theme created by [YuHsuan](http://beantech.org) modified from the original Porter [Kaijun](http://kaijun.rocks/hexo-theme-huxblog/) # [Live Demo](http://beantech.org) --- ![BeanTech Desktop](http://beantech.org/img/beantech-desktop.png) # Usage --- I publish the whole project for your convenience, so you can just follow the instruction down below, then you can easily customiz your own blog! Let's begin!!! ## Init --- ```bash git clone https://github.com/YenYuHsuan/hexo-theme-beantech.git ./hexo-beantech cd hexo-beantech npm install ``` ## Modify --- Modify `_config.yml` file with your own info. Especially the section: ### Deployment Replace to your own repo! ```yml deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com// branch: ``` ### Sidebar settings Copy your avatar image to `/img/` and modify the `_config.yml`: ```yml sidebar: true # whether or not using Sidebar. sidebar-about-description: "" sidebar-avatar: img/ ``` and activate your personal widget you like ```yml widgets: # here are widget you can use, you can comment out - featured-tags - short-about - recent-posts - friends-blog - archive - category ``` if you want to add sidebar widget, please add at `layout/_widget`. ### Signature Setup Copy your signature image to `/img/signature` and modify the `_config.yml`: ```yml signature: true # show signature signature-img: img/signature/ ``` ### Go to top icon Setup My icon is using iron man, you can change to your own icon at `css/image`. ### Post tag You can decide to show post tags or not. ```yml home_posts_tag: true ``` ![home_posts_tag-true](home_posts_tag-true.png) ```yml home_posts_tag: false ``` ![home_posts_tag-false](home_posts_tag-false.png) ### Markdown render My markdown render engine plugin is [hexo-renderer-markdown-it](https://github.com/celsomiranda/hexo-renderer-markdown-it). ```yml # Markdown-it config ## Docs: https://github.com/celsomiranda/hexo-renderer-markdown-it/wiki markdown: render: html: true xhtmlOut: false breaks: true linkify: true typographer: true quotes: '‚Äú‚Äù‚Äò‚Äô' ``` and if you want to change the header anchor '‚Ñ¨', you can go to `layout/post.ejs` to change it. ```javascript async("https://cdn.bootcss.com/anchor-js/1.1.1/anchor.min.js",function(){ anchors.options = { visible: 'hover', placement: 'left', icon: ‚Ñ¨ // this is the header anchor "unicode" icon }; ``` ## Hexo Basics --- Some hexo command: ```bash hexo new post "" # you can change post to another layout if you want hexo clean && hexo generate # generate the static file hexo server # run hexo in local environment hexo deploy # hexo will push the static files automatically into the specific branch(gh-pages) of your repo! ``` # Have fun ^_^ --- Please Star this Project if you like it! Follow would also be appreciated! Peace!
Post.content:
Ported Theme of Hux Blog, Thank Huxpro for designing such a flawless theme.

This BeanTech theme created by YuHsuan modified from the original Porter Kaijun

Usage

I publish the whole project for your convenience, so you can just follow the instruction down below, then you can easily customiz your own blog!

Let‚Äôs begin!!!

Init

Modify

Modify _config.yml file with your own info.
Especially the section:

Deployment

Replace to your own repo!

Sidebar settings

Copy your avatar image to <root>/img/ and modify the _config.yml:

and activate your personal widget you like

if you want to add sidebar widget, please add at layout/_widget.

Signature Setup

Copy your signature image to <root>/img/signature and modify the _config.yml:

Go to top icon Setup

My icon is using iron man, you can change to your own icon at css/image.

Post tag

You can decide to show post tags or not.

Markdown render

My markdown render engine plugin is hexo-renderer-markdown-it.

and if you want to change the header anchor ‚Äò‚Ñ¨‚Äô, you can go to layout/post.ejs to change it.

Hexo Basics

Some hexo command:

Have fun ^_^

Please Star this Project if you like it! Follow would also be appreciated!
Peace!
